My iOS apps

These are apps I have created in my free time.

iSay
the first transliteration app.

Last updated: Nov 26, 2013

Created: Nov 26, 2013

iSay is the very first app to transliterate English words into Chinese words. Available for Cantonese and Mandarin, simplified and traditional.

Vancouver Transit
an offline schedule.

Last updated: Nov 12, 2013

Created: April 17, 2013

Vancouver Transit is an up-to-date offline schedule for public transit services in Vancouver.

Lights
a puzzle game with lights.

Last updated: July 25, 2013

Created: July 9, 2013

Lights is an puzzle game composed up bending and fusing light beams.

Arithmafall
a math puzzle game.

Last updated: April 25, 2013

Created: September 27, 2012

Arithmafall is a puzzle game that helps people of all ages review their arithmetic skills.

MineSweep
a classic puzzle game.

Last updated: April 25, 2013

Created: October 1, 2012

MineSweep is an adaptation of the classic game of minesweeper.

MultiSnake
a multiplayer game.

Last updated: May 3, 2013

Created: April 13, 2012

MultiSnake is the classic game of snakes, but with multiplayer mode.
